briefTitle: KN035 in Combination With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel in HER2-positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: KN035, a Single Domain PD-L1 Subcutanuous Injection Antibody, in Combination With Trastuzumab and Docetaxel in HER2-positive Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Written informed consent
* Female subjects with age 18 to 70 (inclusive) years at the time of consent
* LVEF ≥50% at baseline
* ECOG performance status of 0-1
* Have not received 1L treatment for recurrent or metastatic breast cancer
* Adequate organ function

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of exposure to the cumulative doses of doxorubicin \> 400 mg / m2 or equivalent
* History of autoimmune diseases
* Active brain metastasis
* Concurrent diseases that compromise patient's safety
